page.title: 13Fishing off Stone Pier.
page.content: Every Monday for two years I have been going down to the{Stone Pier}and fishing with{Weymouth Angling club. Weymouth Angling Club House was built in 1973.It is a small single floored building where every Monday a group of people meet and go fishing.We meet there at 6.30pm and we leave to go fishing at 6.45pm.We go to Stone Pier. We catch{pollack,mackerel,pout-whiting {and}smolt.We leave the Pier at 9 o' clock and we go back to the Club for a drink and a packet of crisps. At the Angling Club there is a bar, two pool tables,two fruit machines, a Space Invader and a dart board. The rod I use is a Black Match rod. The reel I use is a Kardinal Mark 2. The baits I use are rag/lug-worm.The {tackle shop}I use is called{Haymans. -Simon Richards.
